t=a.createElement("script");t.src=e,t.defer=t.type="text/javascript",a.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(t)}for(i=Array("flag","emoji"),t.supports={everything:!0,everythingExceptFlag:!0},o=0;o<i.length;o++)t.supports[i[o]]=l(i[o]),t.supports.everything=t.supports.everything&&t.supports[i[o]],"flag"!==i[o]&&(t.supports.everythingExceptFlag=t.supports.everythingExceptFlag&&t.supports[i[o]]);t.supports.everythingExceptFlag=t.supports.everythingExceptFlag&&!t.supports.flag,t.DOMReady=!1,t.readyCallback=function(){t.DOMReady=!0},t.supports.everything||(n=function(){t.readyCallback()},a.addEventListener?(a.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",n,!1),e.addEventListener("load",n,!1)):(e.attachEvent("onload",n),a.attachEvent("onreadystatechange",function(){"complete"===a.readyState&&t.readyCallback()})),(r=t.source||{}).concatemoji?d(r.concatemoji):r.wpemoji&&r.twemoji&&(d(r.twemoji),d(r.wpemoji)))}(window,document,window._wpemojiSettings);\n\t\t</script>\n\t\t<style type="text/css">\nimg.wp-smiley,\nimg.emoji {\n\tdisplay: inline !important;\n\tborder: none !important;\n\tbox-shadow: none !important;\n\theight: 1em !important;\n\twidth: 1em !important;\n\tmargin: 0 .07em !important;\n\tvertical-align: -0.1em !important;\n\tbackground: none !important;\n\tpadding: 0 !important;\n}\n</style>\n\t\n<style>\n\t:root {\n\t\t--primary_color: Community Center seeks return to glory days\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</a>\n\t\t\t\t\t</h4>\n\t\n\t\t\t\t\n\t\n\t\n\t</div>\n\n\n</article><article class="article-list__article">\n<div\n\tclass="article-list__article-text"\n\tdata-article-list-id=""\n\tdata-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text"\n\tdata-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb"\n\tdata-current-image-context="[]"\n>\n\t\t\t<h4 class="article-list__article-title">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<a\n\t\t\t\t\thref="https://www.wrbl.com/golden-apple/marion-county-teacher-awarded-kinetic-credit-union-golden-apple-award/"\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\tMarion County Teacher Awarded Kinetic Credit Union Golden Apple Award\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</a>\n\t\t\t\t\t</h4>\n\t\n\t\t\t\t\n\t\n\t\n\t\t\t\n<span\n\taria-hidden="true"\n\ttabindex="-1"\n\tclass="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video"\n>\n\t<span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">\n\t\t<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="11" height="13" viewBox="0 0 11 13"><defs><style>.cls-1{fill:#fff;fill-rule:evenodd}</style></defs><path id="video_small_carousel_button_default" data-name="video small carousel button default" class="cls-1" d="M842 1167.5l-11 6.5v-13z" transform="translate(-831 -1161)"/></svg>\t</span>\n\t\t\t<span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-text">Video</span>\n\t</span>\n\t</div>\n\n\n</article><article class="article-list__article">\n<div\n\tclass="article-list__article-text"\n\tdata-article-list-id=""\n\tdata-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text"\n\tdata-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb"\n\tdata-current-image-context="[]"\n>\n\t\t\t<h4 class="article-list__article-title">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<a\n\t\t\t\t\thref="https://www.wrbl.com/community/wrbl-premieres-new-jobs-report-connects-viewers-with-local-opportunities/"\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\tWRBL premieres new jobs report, connects viewers with local opportunities\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</a>\n\t\t\t\t\t</h4>\n\t\n\t\t\t\t\n\t\n\t\n\t\t\t\n<span\n\taria-hidden="true"\n\ttabindex="-1"\n\tclass="article-list__article-mediaicon class="article-list__article">\n<div\n\tclass="article-list__article-text"\n\tdata-article-list-id=""\n\tdata-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text"\n\tdata-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb"\n\tdata-current-image-context="[]"\n>\n\t\t\t<h4 href="https://www.wrbl.com/news/health/coronavirus/"><img width="850" height="82" class="site-main">\n\n\t\t\t\t\n<article class="article post-348647 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news category-top-stories" data-component="article">\n\t\n<header class="article-header">\n\t<h1 class="article-title">\n\t\tWhite House adviser Stephen Miller tests positive for coronavirus\t</h1>\n\n\t\t\t<div class="article-eyebrow">\n\t\t\t<a href="https://www.wrbl.com/news/">News</a>\n\t\t</div>\n\t\n\t\n\t<div class="article-meta">\n\t\t\t\t\t<p>by: Nexstar Media Wire</p>\n\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\tPosted: <time datetime="2020-10-07T00:15:48-04:00">Oct 7, 2020 / 12:15 AM EDT</time>\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t<span class="article-meta--sep"> / </span>Updated: <time datetime="2020-10-07T11:30:16-04:00">Oct 7, 2020 / 11:30 AM EDT</time>\t\t\t</div><!-- .article-meta -->\n\n\t\t\t<figure class="article-featured-media article-featured-media--is-image">\n\t\t\t\n<div\n\tclass="image-wrapper landscape"\n\t>\n\t<img\n\t\tsrc="https://www.wrbl.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/24/2020/10/Stephen-Miller.jpg?w=2560&#038;h=1440&#038;crop=1"\n\t\talt=""\n\t\tsrcset="https://www.wrbl.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/24/2020/10/Stephen-Miller.jpg?w=160&amp;h=90&amp;crop=1 160w, https://www.wrbl.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/24/2020/10/Stephen-Miller.jpg?w=256&amp;h=144&amp;crop=1 256w, https://www.wrbl.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/24/2020/10/Stephen-Miller.jpg?w=320&amp;h=180&amp;crop=1 320w, https://www.wrbl.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/24/2020/10/Stephen-Miller.jpg?w=512&amp;h=288&amp;crop=1 512w, https://www.wrbl.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/24/2020/10/Stephen-Miller.jpg?w=640&amp;h=360&amp;crop=1 640w, https://www.wrbl.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/24/2020/10/Stephen-Miller.jpg?w=876&amp;h=493&amp;crop=1 876w, https://www.wrbl.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/24/2020/10/Stephen-Miller.jpg?w=960&amp;h=540&amp;crop=1 960w, https://www.wrbl.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/24/2020/10/Stephen-Miller.jpg?w=1280&amp;h=720&amp;crop=1 1280w, https://www.wrbl.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/24/2020/10/Stephen-Miller.jpg?w=1752&amp;h=986&amp;crop=1 1752w, https://www.wrbl.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/24/2020/10/Stephen-Miller.jpg?w=1920&amp;h=1080&amp;crop=1 1920w, https://www.wrbl.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/24/2020/10/Stephen-Miller.jpg?w=2560&amp;h=1440&amp;crop=1 2560w"\n\t\tsizes="(max-width: 899px) 50vw, 876px"\n\t\tloading="eager"\n\t/>\n</div>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<figcaption><p>President Donald Trump&#8217;s White House Senior Adviser Stephen Miller walks to the West Wing of the White House after participating in a television interview, Thursday, Aug. 20, 2020, in Washington. (AP Photo/Patrick Semansky)</p>\n</figcaption>\n\t\t\t\t\t</figure>\n\t\n\t<div class="article-lead-share">\n\t\t\n<div data-component="addThisInline" class="social-share addthis">\n\t<div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox"></div>\n</div>\n\t</div>\n</header><!-- .article-header -->\n\n\t\n\t<div class="article-content rich-text">\n\t\t\n\t\t\n<p>WASHINGTON (NEXSTAR) \xe2\x80\x93 Stephen Miller, President Donald Trump\xe2\x80\x99s senior adviser and speechwriter, tested positive for the coronavirus Tuesday.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A senior administration official said Miller had previously tested negative as White House officials have tried to contain an outbreak on the complex that has infected Trump, the first lady and more than a dozen other aides and associates.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Over the last 5 days I have been working remotely and self-isolating, testing negative every day through yesterday.&nbsp;Today, I tested positive for COVID-19 and am in quarantine,&#8221; Miller said in a statement.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure class="wp-block-embed-twitter aligncenter wp-block-embed is-type-rich is-provider-twitter"><div class="wp-block-embed__wrapper">\n<blockquote class="twitter-tweet tw-align-center" data-width="550" data-dnt="true"><p lang="en" dir="ltr">\xe2\x80\x9cOver the last 5 days I have been working remotely and self-isolating, testing negative every day through yesterday.\xc2\xa0Today, I tested positive for COVID-19 and am in quarantine,\xe2\x80\x9d Stephen Miller says in a statement.</p>&mdash; Kaitlan Collins (@kaitlancollins) <a href="https://twitter.com/kaitlancollins/status/1313614932018106370?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">October 6, 2020</a></blockquote><script async src="https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js" charset="utf-8"></script>\n</div></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>Miller is an architect of the president\xe2\x80\x99s \xe2\x80\x9cAmerica First\xe2\x80\x9d foreign policy and restrictive immigration measures.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>His wife, Katie Miller, who serves as communications director to Vice President Mike Pence, previously had the virus and tested negative after the last time she saw him. Katie Miller had been in Salt Lake City with Pence, where he is preparing to debate Democratic vice presidential nominee Kamala Harris, but she left as soon as she found out about her husband\xe2\x80\x99s diagnosis.</p>\n\n\n\n<aside class="promo-link">\n\t<a\n\t\thref="https://www.mytwintiers.com/news-cat/breaking-news/trump-pumps-fist-as-he-walks-out-of-hospital-takes-off-mask-at-white-house/"\n\t\tclass="promo-link__link"\n\t>\n\t\tTrump takes off mask at White House after leaving Walter Reed Medical Center<br>\t</a>\n</aside>\n\n\n\n<p>Miller is the latest in a string of positive diagnoses at a White House where the president, still likely contagious, has returned to continue working.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Criticism that Trump underestimated the the virus and failed to prepare the nation has become a central narrative in Democrat Joe Biden&#8217;s campaign to deny the president a second term. Some academics project that the death toll from COVID-19 could double by the beginning of next year, to around 400,000.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Trump, infected with the coronavirus and hospitalized over the weekend, is now back at the White House. He has tweeted \xe2\x80\x9cDon&#8217;t be afraid of Covid,\xe2\x80\x9d adding: \xe2\x80\x9cDon\xe2\x80\x99t let it dominate your life. We have developed, under the Trump Administration, some really great drugs &amp; knowledge.\xe2\x80\x9d He says he plans to return to the campaign trail.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><em>The Associated Press contributed to this report.</em></p>\n\n\t\t<div class="article-content-cta-group">\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t</div><!-- .rich-text -->\n\n\t\n<footer class="article-footer">\n\t\t\t<p class="article-copyright">Copyright 2020 Nexstar Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.</p>\n\t\n\t\n\t<div class="article-footer-share">\n\t\t\t\t\t<h2 class="article-footer-share__heading">Share this today but cooler temperatures return this weekend\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</a>\n\t\t\t\t\t</h3>\n\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<footer class="article-list__article-meta">\n\t\t\t\t<a class="article-list__article-thumb">\n\t\t\t\t\t<a\n\t\t\t\thref="https://www.wrbl.com/weather/7-day-forecast/mild-today-but-cooler-temperatures-return-this-weekend/"\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t>\n\t\t\n\t\t<div class="article-list article-list--full-width">\n\t\t\n\n\t<h2 class="article-list__heading article-list__heading--notched">\n\t\tMore News Stories\t</h2>\n\n\n<div article-list__article--has-thumb class="article-list__article-title">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\tRepublicans push towards confirming Barrett to SCOTUS\n\t\t\t\t\t</h3>\n\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<footer class="article-list__article-byline">\n\t\t\t\tby Raquel Martin <span class="sep">/</span> <time datetime="2020-10-15T16:38:55-04:00">Oct 15, 2020</time>\t\t\t</footer>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div class="article-list__article-excerpt article-list__article-excerpt--is-faded rich-text">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t<p>WASHINGTON (NEXSTAR) \xe2\x80\x94 Thursday, Democrats continued their plea to stop Republicans from confirming judge Amy Coney Barrett to the Supreme Court.</p>\n<p>"This is a sham. This vacancy should not be filled until we have a new president," said U.S. Sen. Amy Klobuchar, D-MN.</p>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\n\t\t\t<div class="article-list__read-more article-list__read-more--w-arrow">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span>\n\t\t\t\t\tRead the Full follows Twitter and Facebook with QAnon crackdown\n\t\t\t\t\t</h3>\n\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<footer class="article-list__article-byline">\n\t\t\t\tby The Associated Press and Nexstar Media Wire <span class="sep">/</span> <time datetime="2020-10-15T16:24:16-04:00">Oct 15, 2020</time>\t\t\t</footer>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div class="article-list__article-excerpt article-list__article-excerpt--is-faded rich-text">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t<p>OAKLAND, Calif. (AP) \xe2\x80\x94 YouTube is following the lead of Twitter and Facebook, saying that it is taking more steps to limit QAnon and other baseless conspiracy theories that can lead to real-world violence.</p>\n<p>The Google-owned video platform said Thursday it will now prohibit material targeting a person or group with conspiracy theories that have been used to justify violence.</p>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\n\t\t\t<div class="article-list__read-more article-list__read-more--w-arrow">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span>\n\t\t\t\t\tRead the Full Article\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span 0 0 1 1.03-1.05l5.022 4.94s0 .01.008.01a.016.016 0 0 0 .017.01.8.8 0 0 1 .163.32c.007.03.009.06.013.09z"/>\n\t</svg>\n</span>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</span>\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\n\t</div>\n\n\n\t<figure warning: New recall for hand sanitizer after Poison control officials warned it could be mistaken as children&#8217;s food pouches\n\t\t\t\t\t</h3>\n\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<footer class="article-list__article-byline">\n\t\t\t\tby Elizabeth Chmurak, Alexa Mencia, and Emily Akins/KFOR <span class="sep">/</span> <time datetime="2020-10-15T16:12:58-04:00">Oct 15, 2020</time>\t\t\t</footer>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div class="article-list__article-excerpt article-list__article-excerpt--is-faded rich-text">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t<p>OKLAHOMA CITY (NewsNation Now) \xe2\x80\x94 The U.S. Food &amp; Drug Administration issued a warning for a recall from Ashtel Studios due to misbranding of hand sanitizer packaged in pouches.</p>\n<p>The .84 fluid ounce pouches resemble food and drink containers made for kids, according to the FDA. </p>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\n\t\t\t<div class="article-list__read-more article-list__read-more--w-arrow">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span>\n\t\t\t\t\tRead the Full Article\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class="icon icon--arrow">\n\t<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 .163.32c.007.03.009.06.013.09z"/>\n\t</svg>\n</span>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</span>\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\n\t</div>\n\n\n\t<figure class="article-list__article-thumb
